pageContext.claim: “The Heritage Foundation has just stated that 64% of the Trump Agenda is already done, faster than even Ronald Reagan. 'We’re blown away,' said Thomas Binion of Heritage, President Trump 'is very active, very conservative and very effective. Huge volume & spectrum of issues.'”
pageContext.analysis: The Heritage Foundation was referring to its own agenda, not the Trump agenda. The "Mandate for Leadership" included a number of policies that were quite different than what Trump promoted in the campaign.
